I couldn't sleep last night so I had a voice conversation with ChatGPT about abolishment of slave trade and somehow we ended up talking about mountains under the sea, or seamounts

It turned out that Hawaii islands are just an underwater 6k mountain rising from a seafloor that break the ocean surface to become an island

It blew my mind, I lost consciousness, and went to sleep. Sharing it for other folks who cannot fall asleep tonight. gn
